import { Icon } from '@iconify/react' import React from 'react' import { GlobalState } from '../../GlobalState' export default function SearchWidget({title}) { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [offer , setOffer] = state.offersApi.offers const [pays , setpays]= state.offersApi.pays const [sort , setSort]= state.offersApi.sort const [search , setSearch]= state.offersApi.search return ( <>

{title}

) }
